nl.inl.blacklab.search.lucene

Class SpanQueryAndNot

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.lucene.search.Query
      • org.apache.lucene.search.spans.SpanQuery
        • nl.inl.blacklab.search.lucene.SpanQueryAndNot
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class SpanQueryAndNot
extends org.apache.lucene.search.spans.SpanQuery
    A SpanQuery for an AND NOT query: [word = "look" & pos != "VERB"] (find occurrences of the word "look" but exclude the verb form)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
